Template.name: Debug
Template.description: Only for debugging rules based on other templates. It is showing all properties of the rule.

Param.name: bNavigationRule
Param.caption: Navigation Rule
Param.help: Is this a navigation smart object rule?

Param.name: sEvent
Param.caption: Event
Param.help: Event on which this rule will be triggered

Param.name: userClass
Param.caption: Class
Param.help: Only users of this class will be considered

Param.name: userState
Param.caption: State Pattern
Param.help: Only users which state matches this pattern will be considered

Param.name: userHelper
Param.caption: Helper
Param.help: User's helper point used in calculations

Param.name: iMaxAlertness
Param.caption: Max. Alertness
Param.help: Consider only users which alertness state is not higher

ParamGroup.name: Object
ParamGroup.help: Defines the smart object to be used.

Param.name: objectClass
Param.caption: Class
Param.help: Only objects of this class will be considered

Param.name: objectState
Param.caption: State Pattern
Param.help: Only objects which state matches this pattern will be considered

Param.name: objectHelper
Param.caption: Helper
Param.help: Object's helper point used in calculations

ParamGroup.name: Navigation
ParamGroup.help: An AI navigation link will be created between these two helpers

Param.name: entranceHelper
Param.caption: Entrance
Param.help: Entrance point of navigational smart object

Param.name: exitHelper
Param.caption: Exit
Param.help: Exit point of navigational smart object

Param.name: limitsDistanceFrom
Param.caption: Distance from
Param.help: Range at which objects could be used

Param.name: limitsDistanceTo
Param.caption: Distance to
Param.help: Range at which objects could be used

Param.name: limitsOrientation
Param.caption: Orientation
Param.help: Orientation limit at which objects could be used

Param.name: horizLimitOnly
Param.caption: Horizontal Limit Only
Param.help: When checked, the limit only applies to horizontal orientation (vertical orientation is excluded)

Param.name: limitsOrientationToTarget
Param.caption: User's Target
Param.help: Object's orientation limit towards the user's attention target

Param.name: delayMinimum
Param.caption: Minimum
Param.help: Shortest time needed for interaction to happen

Param.name: delayMaximum
Param.caption: Maximum
Param.help: Longest time needed for interaction to happen

Param.name: delayMemory
Param.caption: Memory
Param.help: Time needed to forget

Param.name: multipliersProximity
Param.caption: Proximity
Param.help: How important is the proximity

Param.name: multipliersOrientation
Param.caption: Orientation
Param.help: How important is the orientation of the user towards the object

Param.name: multipliersVisibility
Param.caption: Visibility
Param.help: How important is the visibility between user and object

Param.name: multipliersRandomness
Param.caption: Randomness
Param.help: How much randomness will be added

Param.name: fLookAtOnPerc
Param.caption: LookAt On %
Param.help: Look at the object before using it (only when the user is an AI agent)

Param.name: userPreActionState
Param.caption: User: Pre-Action State
Param.help: How user's states will change before executing the action

Param.name: objectPreActionState
Param.caption: Object: Pre-Action State
Param.help: How object's states will change before executing the action

Param.name: actionType
Param.caption: Action Type
Param.help: What type of action to execute

Param.name: actionName
Param.caption: Action Name
Param.help: The action to be executed on interaction

Param.name: userPostActionState
Param.caption: User: Post-Action State
Param.help: How user's states will change after executing the action

Param.name: objectPostActionState
Param.caption: Object: Post-Action State
Param.help: How object's states will change after executing the action

Param.name: approachSpeed
Param.caption: Speed
Param.help: Movement speed while approaching the helper point

Param.name: approachStance
Param.caption: Stance
Param.help: Body stance while approaching the helper point

Param.name: animationHelper
Param.caption: Animation Helper
Param.help: Object's helper point at which the animation will be played

Param.name: approachHelper
Param.caption: Approach Helper
Param.help: Object's helper point to approach before the animation play (if empty the Animation Helper is used)

Param.name: fStartRadiusTolerance
Param.caption: Start Radius
Param.help: Start radius (tolerance) for playing animation

Param.name: fStartDirectionTolerance
Param.caption: Direction Tolerance
Param.help: Start direction (tolerance) for playing animation

Param.name: fTargetRadiusTolerance
Param.caption: Target Radius
Param.help: Target radius (tolerance) for playing animation

Template.name: Time Based
Template.description: Executes the action after spending the specified amount of time during which the condition is satisfied.

Param.name: userClass
Param.caption: Class
Param.help: Only smart objects of this class will be considered

Param.name: userState
Param.caption: State Pattern
Param.help: Only smart objects which state matches this pattern will be considered

Param.name: userHelper
Param.caption: Helper
Param.help: User's helper point used in calculations

Param.name: iMaxAlertness
Param.caption: Max. Alertness
Param.help: Consider only users which alertness state is not higher

Param.name: delayMinimum
Param.caption: Minimum
Param.help: Shortest time needed for action to be executed

Param.name: delayMaximum
Param.caption: Maximum
Param.help: Longest time needed for action to be executed

Param.name: delayMemory
Param.caption: Memory
Param.help: Time needed to expire

Param.name: userPreActionState
Param.caption: Pre-Action State
Param.help: How object's states will change before executing the action

Param.name: actionType
Param.caption: Action Type
Param.help: What type of action to execute

Param.name: actionName
Param.caption: Action Name
Param.help: The action to be executed on interaction

Param.name: userPostActionState
Param.caption: Post-Action State
Param.help: How object's states will change after executing the action

Template.name: Navigation
Template.description: Creates navigation links in smart objects.

Param.name: userClass
Param.caption: Class
Param.help: Only users of this class will be able to pass thru this link

Param.name: userState
Param.caption: State Pattern
Param.help: Only users which state matches this pattern will pass thru this link

Param.name: iMaxAlertness
Param.caption: Max. Alertness
Param.help: Only users which alertness state is not higher will pass thru this link

ParamGroup.name: Object
ParamGroup.help: Defines the smart object in which navigation link will be created.

Param.name: objectClass
Param.caption: Class
Param.help: Smart object class to be used for navigation.

Param.name: objectState
Param.caption: State Pattern
Param.help: Only if object's state matches this pattern the link will be considered as passable

Param.name: entranceHelper
Param.caption: Entrance
Param.help: Entrance point of the link

Param.name: exitHelper
Param.caption: Exit
Param.help: Exit point of the link

Param.name: multipliersProximity
Param.caption: Cost Multiplier
Param.help: The distance between helpers multiplied with this value gives the cost of passing through

Param.name: userPreActionState
Param.caption: User: Pre-Action State
Param.help: How user's states will change before executing the action

Param.name: objectPreActionState
Param.caption: Object: Pre-Action State
Param.help: How object's states will change before executing the action

Param.name: actionType
Param.caption: Action Type
Param.help: What type of action to execute

Param.name: actionName
Param.caption: Action Name
Param.help: The action to be executed in order to pass the link

Param.name: userPostActionState
Param.caption: User: Post-Action State
Param.help: How user's states will change after executing the action

Param.name: objectPostActionState
Param.caption: Object: Post-Action State
Param.help: How object's states will change after executing the action

Param.name: animationHelper
Param.caption: Animation Helper
Param.help: Object's helper point at which the animation will be played (default is the Entrance helper point)

Param.name: fStartRadiusTolerance
Param.caption: Start Radius
Param.help: Start radius (tolerance) for playing animation

Param.name: fStartDirectionTolerance
Param.caption: Direction Tolerance
Param.help: Start direction (tolerance) for playing animation

Param.name: fTargetRadiusTolerance
Param.caption: Target Radius
Param.help: Target radius (tolerance) for playing animation

Template.name: Idle - Basic
Template.description: Defines basic idle action. Each user can use only one object at a time. Other users can not use that object until interaction is finished. After that both the user and the object are available for other interactions.

Param.name: userClass
Param.caption: User Class
Param.help: Defines the smart object class of the user

Param.name: objectClass
Param.caption: Object Class
Param.help: Defines the smart object class of the object

Param.name: limitsDistanceFrom
Param.caption: Distance From
Param.help: Range at which objects might be used

Param.name: limitsDistanceTo
Param.caption: Distance To
Param.help: Range at which objects might be used

Param.name: horizLimitOnly
Param.caption: Horizontal Limit Only
Param.help: When checked, the limit only applies to horizontal orientation (vertical orientation is excluded)

Param.name: delayMinimum
Param.caption: Minimum
Param.help: Shortest time needed for interaction to happen

Param.name: delayMaximum
Param.caption: Maximum
Param.help: Longest time needed for interaction to happen

Param.name: delayMemory
Param.caption: Memory
Param.help: Time needed to forget

Param.name: multipliersProximity
Param.caption: Proximity
Param.help: How important is the proximity

Param.name: multipliersRandomness
Param.caption: Randomness
Param.help: How much randomness will be added

Param.name: fLookAtOnPerc
Param.caption: LookAt On %
Param.help: Look at the object before using it (only when the user is an AI agent)

Param.name: actionType
Param.caption: Action Type
Param.help: What type of action to execute

Param.name: actionName
Param.caption: Action Name
Param.help: The action to be executed on interaction
